name: How to: Life in 2018.
description:
How to: Life in 2018 is a fun lil game about , you know, life. Your choices matter, whether you know it or not. And remember, there's no bad ending. Unless you consider them to be bad endings. Then they're really bad. 

Named most frustrating game of the year in 2018 at the Frustrating Games Award. 

[This game also works on mobile]
